issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement INIT_CAP function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12592](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12592). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The function capitalizes the first letter in each word of a given text.
